channel.title: ClickingMost Help [Delta] - Fixed

item.title: ClickingMost Help [Delta] - Fixed
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Fixed it on my own guys, Thanks anyway.

I added this code to clickingmost.java, Its a new starter thing where they pick a skillid via interface and they get 1.5million experiance in that skill. Heres the code + the error.

int skillNum; case 10252://attack 0 skillNum = 0; break; case 10253://strength 2 skillNum = 2; break; case 10254://range 4 skillNum = 4; break; case 10255://mage 6 skillNum = 6; break; case 11000://defence 1 skillNum = 1; break; case 11001://hitpoints 3 skillNum = 3; break; case 11002://prayer 4 skillNum = 4; break; case 11003://agility 16 skillNum = 16; break; case 11004://herblore 15 skillNum = 15; break; case 11005://thieving 17 skillNum = 17; break; case 11006://crafting 12 skillNum = 12; break; case 11007://runecrafting 20 skillNum = 20; break; case 47002://slayer 18 skillNum = 18; break; case 54090://farming 19 skillNum = 19; break; case 11008://mining 14 skillNum = 14; break; case 11009://smithing 13 skillNum = 13; break; case 11010://fishing 10 skillNum = 10; break; case 11011://cooking 7 skillNum = 7; break; case 11012://firemaking 11 skillNum = 11; break; case 11013://woodcutting 8 skillNum = 8; break; case 11014://fletching 9 skillNum = 9; break; case 11015://confirm c.addSkillXP(skillNum, 1500000); c.starter2 = 1; c.sM("You have raised your "+c.statName[skillNum]+", have fun"); break;

And theres the error.

clickingMost.java:213: variable skillNum might not have been initialized c.addSkillXP(skillNum, 1500000); ^

I know ive seen this kind of error before, but I forget how to go about fixing it. Anyone care to help me out?

Read full topic
